body:
built by me, steven5703, Ruyfilos10, and lavaoe15

:>










an iconic defense tbh, the only time it was almost broken was when a really obvious flyhacker went over it :p

title: break-proof monument defense

replies.body: It's a pretty good defense, but can still be broken if there were 1 or 2 people distracting the defenders while one guy breaks it
